title: Me: "ADC or sup plz" -- Teammate: "No We're a Duo Bot"
body:
Me: "I've been sucking in other roles and am first pick"

Teammate: "If you lock in an ADC I am locking feeder Teemo.  Feel free to dodge"

So I did >.>

Why do people like that exist?  And why aren't they being banned instead of our GDers?
